reviews.text: Fantastic, clean, safe, large, well facilitated, family friendly development

I visited my brother who lives here. Its an amazing place with all amenities. A club house , swimming pools, tennis courts, Kids play area and what not. A beautiful place to get yourselves accommodated with your family. The views from the Apartments are splendid. Its lovely to watch people getting healthy Jogging n Exercising around this compound. And People are so friendly that you feel like family. Had an amazing time here when I visited.
Friend's place. Big and spacious units. Big function room. Lifts are undergoing upgrades so only 1 functional lift out of 2. (accurate as at Aug 2017)
Great condo with expansive grounds and large units.  Undergoing repainting and lift upgrading exercise. Should be much better when it's all completed early 2018!

share some bad experience from landlord of #07-03 61 Mount Sinai Drive, Ridgewood condo:
The unit has very old renovation with the original parquet floor from 1978. We rented the house for 4 years. One month after we moving out, I received a bill from landlord for repair work cost $4055 (including vanish living room and dining room area, repair parquet floor & skirting costs $1720!)
The landlord hold our deposit and did not tell what are the repair work to be done during 1st inspection and 2nd inspection.
If you are renting a unit from this condo, be careful of this landlord!
